attributes.action: Stop the Media from using pitbull images to cover ALL dog attacks!
attributes.additional_details:
So say a human attacks someone , would you go and stick a picture of a person who looks completely different to the attacker who commited the crime and publish it as if it was them? This is exactly what the Media are doing. It's barbaric and it's evil and the media need to be stopped from using images of the pitbull terrier for writing their stories!
People need to be educated on these breeds ,they do not need any more bad press than they already have , IT'S WRONG ,It's discrimination and we are offended!!
attributes.background: STOP FALSE ARTICLES FROM BEING WRONGLY PUBLISHED AGAINST PITBULLS AND BULLBREEDS !!  I saw an article today listing 4 attacks, a Collie, an Akita, Boxers and a greyhound...yet stick an image of a terrified bully on the headline!!This is not fair on responsible owners and something needs to be done!

rejection.details:
You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
